committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the naming of the City of Rockville as an "All-American" city.

summary.text: Recognizes the city of Rockville, Maryland, and its residents for their outstanding efforts in making their city an "All American" city.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the naming of the City of Rockville as an "All-American" city.
